ingredients.item: 2 tbsp Johnnie Walker Red Label Whisky
2 tbsp Johnnie Walker Red Label Whisky
2 tbsp orange liqueur, such as Grand Marnier or Cointreau
Twist of orange peel, to serve

instructions.step: Pour the whisky into a champagne flute and add a dash of Angostura Bitters.
Top up with ginger beer and serve swiftly.
Place the ice in a small tumbler and pour over the whisky and orange liqueur.
Muddle together, add a twist of orange peel and serve.
Try adding 2 tbsp sweet vermouth in place of the Angostura Bitters.
